B2O.F.summary: PT Cikarang Listrindo Tbk engages in the generation, marketing, distribution, and agency of electric power in Indonesia. The company owns and operates gas and coal-fired power plants with a total installed capacity of 1,144MW; and a transmission system of 150kV across a distance of 33 kilometers. It serves approximately 2,464 customers in five industrial estates, including manufacturers in the automotive, electronics, plastic, food, chemical, and other sectors. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.
